Reviews.Title: “We loved it”
Reviews.Author: Madhu73
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is conveniently located at 1/2 km from Sarria Station. There is a bus stop right outside the hotel. It is well connected to the City. The rooms are neat and clean and Staff are polite and helpful. They booked taxi for our travel back to airport & gave prompt wake-up calls. The restaurant is OK - not bad and not great either. Rooms have view to the road outside the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very good impressions!”
Reviews.Author: persejonh
Reviews.Content: I have very good impressions from this hotel! Room was good and clean, maybe too small. Good breakfast and very nice location. Near hotel was good supermarket and shops. I have only 2 problems: wi-fi was free but connection was not good. And some nights was a little cold because it was windy from window. I would like especially said about staff - very friendly. I remember this hotel with very warm feelings.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad”
Reviews.Author: WiseTraveller25
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean.But the rooms were pretty much small , the TV was very small and old. The corridors were very narrow. The food was disgusting.It's a good hotel to stay in for one night not more.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible experience, although the personal amability”
Reviews.Author: rociobonet
Reviews.Content: "Although the nice treat of the personal and the good situation (not near the centre) I had a really bad experience for the price I paid for. Not elegant at all. The rooms are claustrophobic, small bed for 2 persons, and not very clean. Nothing to say about the walls, I had the pleasure to hear everything that happens in the room next to ours, the kitchen, the conversations from reception and even worst, the elevator. Please take note that the photos are only for the rooms situated in the 5th floor, so ask for them. The others, like an hostal"

Reviews.Title: “thank you”
Reviews.Author: BuenosAiresEstela
Reviews.Content: I would like to thank the whole staff of the hotel. I stay in this hotel often and I appreciate the kindness and efficiency of Esteban, Ana, Almudena, Laura and the rest of the people who work hard to make my stays always pleasant!...Thank you to all of you...Estela

Reviews.Title: “A great chois”
Reviews.Author: Carina60
Reviews.Content: Me and my boyfriend did book a packettrip from sweden and did pic this hotel because it wasnt in the middle of Barcelona, but still close enoff. The hotel was very nice indeed in many way and the service was exelent, even thou our travel agent hade missed that it was this hotel that we was going to spend 5 nights in, the personal did everything to fix the small issue. We hade 5 wounderful days in this hotel and we are planing on returning.

Reviews.Title: “Small Rooms, Quiet Neighborhood, Good Price”
Reviews.Author: jjmurillo
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff, the rooms are very very small, and they need a good major cleaning. The walls have scuff marks. I did not mind the distance to the train, there is a bus service right in front of the hotel that takes you right to the center of the city. Great water pressure and nice bathrooms.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, hospitable hotel in quiet, attractive neighborhood”
Reviews.Author: dirndlSF
Reviews.Content: Good place in gorgeous neighborhood, away from the nightlife of Barcelona. Little far to the train - good 10min walk - but otherwise great place to stay.

HotelInfo.Name: Catalonia Mikado Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Paseo Bonanova 58, 08017 Barcelona, Spain
